TopicTitle: will there be an AVP config for EVE volumetric clouds?

Articles.Content:
on reddit, in my mod discussion mildlyfrostbitten's response was "volumetric clouds will override anything avp does, including the auroras. tho as far as I know vol. clouds doesn't have auroras yet. if you have the vol. clouds opm configs the only thing avp will really be doing anymore is the dust storms on airless planets.".

but my favourite & gorgeous features of AVP such as those (even make an OPM-VC config for the OPM AVP visuals): 

  • Bioluminescent clouds for Laythe
  • Glow for all non-atmospheric bodies where relevant
  • Up to 8k auroras
  • Surface dust
  • Moho ablation effect
  • 8k Milky Way skybox
  • Geysers on Minmus and Eeloo
  • Visuals for the Outer Planets Mod
Edited February 7 by Xaned Kerman
